list_definition.definition: something by or through which an effect is produced

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Air is the medium through which sound is carried.

list_definition.definition: a means (especially radio, television and newspapers) by which news etc is made known
a person through whom spirits of dead people are said to speak

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I know a medium who says she can communicate with Napoleon.

list_definition.definition: a substance in which specimens are preserved, bacteria grown etc.
middle or average in size, quality etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Would you like the small, medium or large packet?
